specific_question: What percentage of our centennial shoppers have interacted with our customer service team in the past 6 months?
answer: 45% of our centennial shoppers have contacted our customer service team in the past 6 months.
justification: Understanding the current level of customer engagement will help inform the potential impact of chatbot implementation on the consumer experience.
dr_question: How can Lee's Market leverage chatbots to enhance the consumer experience for centennial shoppers?
